node.text:
Galloping in the path of progress at 63, our land stands with pride, draped in glory! We at Raviz Hotels and Resorts take pride in giving you the best snapshot of Kerala's unique traditions and experiences on this auspicious day and always. Happy Kerala Piravi Day!
